item.description:
Transformed by the Light
Mother Clare Watts
Saturday, April 25 â€¢ 10 a.m. to 2 p.m.

Light is known in science to be a healing and preserving power. The light of the sun has been worshiped for centuries and is known to have nurturing effects on the body and mind. This same light can nurture your soul and spirit when it is turned inward for the purpose of spiritual development. Come and learn how to tap into this life-giving light to rejuvenate and regenerate.

Suggested Donation: $30 (lunch included)
item.how_to_find_us: We're just around the corner from the Stony Brook T-stop on the orange line.
item.name: Seminar: Transformed by the Light
